title: THANK YOU RIOT!!! (Jinx Skin Appreciation Post)
body:
I'm SO HAPPY about this new Jinx skin!! I got home from school and saw it and LITERALLY STARTED CRYING. THANK YOU SO MUCH! It looks SO amazing. I tried to create a custom Jinx skin that was also called "Firecracker" and had the same effects design so when this came out for real you can imagine how ECSTATIC I was!! (Still am!) 
Not to mention I literally have a fetish for fireworks, they're my favourite thing. I cry watching them because of how beautiful they are! xD and Jinx is my favourite champion ever, I bought the Vi vs. Jinx poster, her one skin when she was released, changed my summoner name for her when I saw her teaser, bought the figure on release day, framed it and the box, made a jinx calendar for 2015,  own a replica fishbones that I bring EVERYWHERE, bought all the prints at Anime North 2014 of her, cosplayed her at anime north, and I wear temporary Jinx tattoos daily, so I'm so happy about this!!
THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!! 
Also, from a feedback perspective after playing her on the PBE, when I ult, use Fishbones, or the Flame Chompers I can't really hear the fireworks go off D= I was wondering if the sound on those three effects cause it would suck to not have them reach their fullest potential =) 
(Also her joke is currently bugged)
THANK YOU AGAIN YOU'RE AMAZING {{champion:222}} 
I included some pictures of my reaction XD and yeah, I did give myself I headache. Thank you Riot, really.
@Riot KateyKhaos @Riot I love you.

replies.body:
So glad you like her! :3 

Sounds are still being worked on, and I'd be happy to relay that feedback!

Also, what's bugged in regards to her joke?

AH THANK YOU FOR REPLYING!!!
When you use her joke, she does the animation, but the joke isn't played... like her voice doesn't play at all. Taunt works and so does laugh though =D
Really amazing job on the skin

> [{quoted}](name=TheyCallMeJinx,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KAvEnIqn,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-14T00:36:53.284+0000)
>
> AH THANK YOU FOR REPLYING!!!
> When you use her joke, she does the animation, but the joke isn't played... like her voice doesn't play at all. Taunt works and so does laugh though =D
> Really amazing job on the skin

Ah, okay, that's what I thought you meant! Thanks for clarifying!

One more thing I can see that the clouds on the dress are there, but in game it doesnt really show =( Do you think they might be brightened a bit? I'd hate to lose a detail =D
And the eyebrows and burnt part on her dress are amazing XD

> [{quoted}](name=TheyCallMeJinx,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KAvEnIqn,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-14T00:42:03.880+0000)
>
> One more thing I can see that the clouds on the dress are there, but in game it doesnt really show =( Do you think they might be brightened a bit? I'd hate to lose a detail =D
> And the eyebrows and burnt part on her dress are amazing XD

We actually had them brighter, but from an in-game height, it shimmered, and didn't look quite right!

I too like the skin :D

but I must say something about her dress... I understand the **reason(s)** behind this decision... but unrealistic dress physics is unrealistic, just sayin'.

But yeah, my favorite part about the skin is actually the particle effects. I really loved the firework fx on corki's skin, and jinx is a perfect fit for em. :D
Thanks again! You guys are awesome =D

@TheyCallMeJinx , Im soo happy you got the skin you always pictured and of your favorite champions T_T it must be a dream come true... just how does it feeeel :o ! omg ,, i wish and hope one day my girl Sivir will get an skin i want her to have the idea  i have have for her new cool skin is perfect cuz all her other aren't as much to the eye but i know this one is T_T i'm praying n hoping jus as you are!  and @ Riot Gooood job on the skin !  i don't have jinx but i am saving for her ^^ cant wait to see it on the field and one more thing im spreading my Link for my sivir skin Idea every where , like literally so tell me what you think >_< it would really be cool to have  :')   Link: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/trbKBaTi-midnight-shinobi-sivir

trying make us shareholders happy ain't you?

good work Rito, very nice sound effect. Hope you get big red pockets from your parents and the old folks ;)


I'm sure everyone over in CN League is very happy.

> [{quoted}](name=Ofc Sona,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KAvEnIqn,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-14T00:49:38.030+0000)
>
> trying make us shareholders happy ain't you?
> 
> good work Rito, very nice sound effect. Hope you get big red pockets from your parents and the old folks ;)
> 
> 
> I'm sure everyone over in CN League is very happy.

I WANNA MAKE EVERYONE HAPPY XD IM SO HAPPY
Yep she rocks. I'll be waiting cash in hand for it to come out.  gonna be sweet
I've had 1820 RP on my account since she's come out waiting for her next skin just in case it was pricey XD
